Package org.dev.spanciuc.maven.mojo.githooks

Class GitHooksConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.dev.spanciuc.maven.mojo.githooks.GitHooksConfiguration
public class GitHooksConfiguration extends Object
A class represents git hooks configuration parameters.

    Creates a configuration instance with given parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • GitHooksConfiguration

      public GitHooksConfiguration(GitHooksParameters gitHooksParameters)
      Creates a configuration instance with given parameters.

      This method sanitizes and validates parameters value. In case of invalid parameters, an exception will be thrown.

      Parameters:
      gitHooksParameters - the parameters.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters object is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters object has invalid git directory name.
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters object has invalid git hooks directory name.
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters object has invalid commit-msg parameters.

  • Method Details

    • getEnabledHooksGenerators

      public List<GitHookFileGenerator> getEnabledHooksGenerators() throws GitHooksAreDisabledException, NoEnabledGitHooksFoundException
      Gets enabled hooks generators.

      Checks if git hooks are enabled and has at least one enabled git hook. If so return an unmodifiable list of generators.

      Returns:
      generator's list.
      Throws:
      GitHooksAreDisabledException - if git hooks are disabled.
      NoEnabledGitHooksFoundException - if no enabled git hooks found.

    • getGitDirectoryName

      public String getGitDirectoryName()
      Gets the git directory name
      Returns:
      git directory name.

    • getGitHooksDirectoryName

      public String getGitHooksDirectoryName()
      Gets the git hooks directory name
      Returns:
      git hooks directory name.

    • hasEnabledHooks

      public boolean hasEnabledHooks()
      Checks if at least one hook is enabled.
      Returns:
      true if at least one hook is enabled, otherwise - false.

    • isEnabled

      public boolean isEnabled()
      Checks if git hooks are globally enabled.
      Returns:
      true if enabled, otherwise - false.
